what: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions
title: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions
text: {samplezoo} designed simplify generating samples various probability distribution, making easier users create data frames quickly.

title: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions
text: can install development version samplezoo GitHub :

title: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions
text: Creating reprexing datasets Posit Community help forum, can challenging, especially beginners. Similarly, building quick datasets demonstrate problem lecture, troubleshoot, even assign homework can often involve repetitive code time-consuming easy forget. address challenges save time, {samplezoo} provides streamlined approach. example, generating dataset various probability distributions typically looks like : {samplezoo}, can use one line code:

title: Distributions List — distributions
text: list functions generate data frames random variables various distributions. function creates data frame specified distributions sample sizes.

title: Distributions List — distributions
text: list three functions: small Generates data frame 100 samples per distribution. medium Generates data frame 1,000 samples per distribution. large Generates data frame 10,000 samples per distribution.

title: Distributions List — distributions
text: distributions included data frame : norm: Normal distribution mean standard deviation parameters. norm2, norm3: Variations normal distribution different spreads. binom: Binomial (Bernoulli) distribution. neg: Negative binomial distribution. pois: Poisson distribution. exp: Exponential distribution. unif: Uniform distribution. beta: Beta distribution. gamma: Gamma distribution. chisq: Chi-squared distribution. t_dist: Student's t distribution.

what: samplezoo: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo-package
title: samplezoo: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo-package
samplezoo: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo-package
Generate a Sample Dataset — samplezoo
text: Retrieves dataset specified size (small, medium, large) pre-defined distributions list. dataset contains random variables various probability distributions.

title: Generate a Sample Dataset — samplezoo
text: name character string specifying dataset size. Must one : "small", "medium", "large".

title: Generate a Sample Dataset — samplezoo
text: data frame containing simulated data random variables different distributions: norm Normal distribution. norm2, norm3 Variations normal distributions. binom Binomial (Bernoulli) distribution. neg Negative binomial distribution. pois Poisson distribution. exp Exponential distribution. unif Uniform distribution. beta Beta distribution. gamma Gamma distribution. chisq Chi-squared distribution. t_dist Student's t distribution.

title: Generate a Sample Dataset — samplezoo
text: distributions list defines datasets three sizes: "small": 100 samples per distribution. "medium": 1,000 samples per distribution. "large": 10,000 samples per distribution. function checks validity name parameter retrieves corresponding dataset distributions list.

title: Generate a Sample Dataset — samplezoo
code: # Generate a small dataset small_data <- samplezoo("small")  # Generate a medium dataset medium_data <- samplezoo("medium")  # Generate a large dataset large_data <- samplezoo("large")
